CatDescriptText: Cliff Porter, 3534 East Court, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 7, 1959, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that Negroes should push for non-segregated cemeteries, or should they sponsor their own?"  Answer reads: "They should. We are all made by the same God."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Cliff Porter wearing dark jacket and light colored shirt, possibly seated in driver's seat of bus or trolley
